statements: SELECT * FROM manufacturing_process_inspection;
SELECT product_name, inspection_date, inspector_name FROM manufacturing_process_inspection WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_process_inspection WHERE non_conforming_product = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, inspector_name, inspection_date FROM manufacturing_process_inspection ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, inspector_name FROM manufacturing_process_inspection WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT product_name, inspection_date FROM manufacturing_process_inspection;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_process_inspection WHERE non_conforming_product = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, inspector_name, inspection_date FROM manufacturing_process_inspection WHERE inspection_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT inspector_name, COUNT(*) AS inspection_count FROM manufacturing_process_inspection GROUP BY inspector_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_process_inspection WHERE product_name LIKE '%Widget%';
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_processes;
SELECT product_name, inspector_id FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE inspector_id = 3;
SELECT process_id, product_name, inspector_id, inspection_result FROM manufacturing_processes ORDER BY inspector_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, inspector_id, COUNT(*) AS total_processes FROM manufacturing_processes GROUP BY inspector_id;
SELECT product_name, inspection_result FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass' OR inspection_result = 'Fail';
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_processes
SELECT product_name, inspector_id FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE process_id > 100
SELECT product_name, inspection_result FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE inspector_id = 10
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_processes ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(product_name) AS total_products FROM manufacturing_processes
SELECT * FROM inspectors;
SELECT name, location FROM inspectors;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT defect_type FROM defects WHERE defect_id = 1;
SELECT inspector_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY inspector_id;
SELECT * FROM inspectors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT product_name, defect_type FROM products INNER JOIN defects ON products.product_id = defects.product_id;
SELECT product_name, inspector_id, defect_type FROM products JOIN defects ON products.product_id = defects.product_id WHERE defect_type = 'crack';

SELECT inspectors.name, products.product_name, defects.defect_type FROM inspectors JOIN products ON inspectors.id = products.inspector_id JOIN defects ON products.product_id = defects.product_id ORDER BY inspectors.name ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_defects FROM defects WHERE defect_type LIKE '%broken%';
SELECT * FROM non_conforming_products;
SELECT product_name FROM non_conforming_products WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM inspections WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, process_name FROM products JOIN manufacturing_processes ON products.process_id = manufacturing_processes.process_id;
SELECT id, product_name, non_conforming_reason FROM non_conforming_products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, product_name, non_conforming_reason FROM non_conforming_products WHERE product_name LIKE '%defective%' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, m.process_name FROM products p JOIN manufacturing_processes m ON p.process_id = m.process_id;
SELECT p.product_name, i.inspection_date, i.inspector_name FROM inspections i JOIN products p ON i.product_id = p.id ORDER BY i.inspection_date DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, np.non_conforming_reason FROM products p LEFT JOIN non_conforming_products np ON p.id = np.id WHERE np.id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM inspectors;
SELECT id, name FROM products WHERE inspector_id = 1;
SELECT name, reason FROM non_conforming_products WHERE manufacturing_process_id = 3;
SELECT id, result FROM inspections ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE inspector_id = 2 AND product_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM inspectors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT inspectors.name, products.name FROM inspectors JOIN products ON inspectors.id = products.inspector_id;
SELECT inspections.id, inspections.result, inspectors.name FROM inspections JOIN inspectors ON inspections.inspector_id = inspectors.id;
SELECT products.name, non_conforming_products.reason FROM products LEFT JOIN non_conforming_products ON products.id = non_conforming_products.product_id;

SELECT inspectors.name AS inspector_name, products.name AS product_name, manufacturing_process.name AS process_name FROM inspectors JOIN products ON inspectors.id = products.inspector_id JOIN manufacturing_process ON non_conforming_products.manufacturing_process_id = manufacturing_process.id;
